description: Collaborated with the Data Management System team in the development and maintenance of over 40 internal weather data components using Java
Designed, developed and tested a new JSON file handler configuration to translate complex meteorological data into an accessible format
Led the development of two new decoders during the migration to the OMNES framework
Contributed to software development in support of Professor McArthur's Smart Building Research Group activities
Developed a Python framework for generating synthetic time-series data
Implemented functionalities for linear relationships, random noise, and cyclic patterns, utilizing configuration files to customize data parameters for enhanced simulation and testing
Assist in feature buildouts and app screen design using Figma
Perform ground-level research targeting user oral health habits and dentist-patient interactions
Work on user product mapping ideation and execution using the quantitative data acquired from research
Communicate with over 70 customers daily, assisting with transactions and addressing their banking needs
Offer personalized advice on banking products, including loans, lines of credit, and mortgages, contributing to increased product sales and improved customer satisfaction.
